item.title: Data Recode
item.description: Import Relgion Income File library(readxl) rel_inc <- read_excel("relig-income.xlsx") rel_inc ## # A tibble: 12 x 6 ## `Religious tradition` `Less than $30,00~ `$30,000-$49,99~ `$50,000-$99,99~ ## <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 "Buddhist" 0.36 0.18 0.32 ## 2 "Catholic" 0.36 0.19 0.26 ## 3 "Evangelical Protestant" 0.35 0.22 0.28 ## 4 "Hindu" 0.17 0.13 0.34 ## 5 "Historically Black Pro~ 0.53 0.22 0.17 ## 6 "Jehovah's Witness" 0.48 0.25 0.
